response.overview: So it was just another guys night out, us doing what we normally do and just shooting the sh*t and chillin, enjoying each other's company. So us being the horny SOB'S we are, one of my buddies brings up the topic of gangbangs and how we feel about them. Of course, we're all down for it. Hell, I had been in a few before. Now, with us already being in a mood and our waitress looking sexy as fuck, we had to know how a woman felt about getting dick down by a bunch of guys. It just so happened that our waitress was very fond of the idea and had been in some herself. She offered us to come into the back, and she would give us a demonstration. response.title: 5 Guys 1 Waitress
